lib
Class NetPacketConn

java.lang.Object
  lib.CommonNetConn<MixedPacket>
      lib.NetPacketConn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config, CommonConfig, java.lang.Runnable
public class NetPacketConn
extends CommonNetConn<MixedPacket>
implements java.lang.Runnable, Config

this version of network connection uses "MixedPacket" as the transport mechanism, each mixed packet contains a string intended to be parsed using nextToken() and an optional binary payload.

Author:
Ddyer

Method Detail

setBufSize

public void setBufSize(int n)
Description copied from class: CommonNetConn
set the buffer size, which may be a limitation on the amount of data in a packet. There's no reason to low ball this number, but infinitely large packets are probably evidence of a runaway.

Specified by:
setBufSize in class CommonNetConn<MixedPacket>
